replies.message: Hey Hassan. Facebook automatically verifies certain accounts to help people find authentic profiles and Pages. We're not currently able to accept requests for verified profiles or Pages from the public. -Jenny

Facebook  We're not currently able to accept requests for verified profiles or Pages from the public?
